description: Manage the reliability of a cluster.

commands.name: az sf cluster reliability update
commands.summary: Update the reliability tier for the primary node in a cluster.
commands.syntax:
az sf cluster reliability update --cluster-name
                                 --reliability-level {Bronze, Gold, Platinum, Silver}
                                 --resource-group
                                 [--auto-add-node]
examples: az sf cluster reliability update -g group-name -c cluster1 --reliability-level Silver
